pma:database.name: Bughound
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `attachments` ( `attachment_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `path` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `bug_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`attachment_id`), KEY `fk_bug_key` (`bug_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_bug_key` FOREIGN KEY (`bug_id`) REFERENCES `bugs` (`bug_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `bugs` ( `bug_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `program_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `report_type` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `severity` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `problem_summary` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `problem` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `suggested_fix` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `bug_date` date NOT NULL, `area_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `assignee` int(11) NOT NULL, `comments` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `priority` int(11) NOT NULL, `resolution` int(11) NOT NULL, `resolution version` int(11) NOT NULL, `resolvee` int(11) NOT NULL, `resolve_date` date NOT NULL, `testee` int(11) NOT NULL, `test_date` int(11) NOT NULL, `employee_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bug_id`), KEY `fk_program_key` (`program_id`), KEY `fk_area_key` (`area_id`), KEY `fk_employee_id` (`employee_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_area_key` FOREIGN KEY (`area_id`) REFERENCES `areas` (`area_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_employee_id` FOREIGN KEY (`employee_id`) REFERENCES `employees` (`employee_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_program_key` FOREIGN KEY (`program_id`) REFERENCES `programs` (`program_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `employees` ( `employee_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `user_name` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `user_level` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`employee_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
